notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Writing—original draft preparation, T.S.R.N. and M.d.S.P.; writing—review and editing, T.S.R.N. and M.d.S.P.; search—selection of articles, T.S.R.N., M.d.S.P., L.P.S.N., and M.B.d.S.A.; writing—review of biologic activities part, N.O.M., S.I.d.S.B., and A.d.C.J.; writing—review of chemical compounds part, O.d.A.A., W.d.S.T., and M.G.C.V.; supervision, writing—review of the manuscript, R.B.-F. and I.J.C.V. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
